title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 June 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:15 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <tmortagne> vmassol: yea the hard thing with dom4j is that we have API that takes dom4j classes  
09:26 <tmortagne> XWikiDocument#toXML for example  
09:27 <vmassol> you mean XMLWriter  
09:27 <vmassol>  ?  
09:27 <tmortagne> XMLWriter extends org.dom4j.io.XMLWriter  
09:27 <vmassol> yep saw that  
09:27 <tmortagne> it just add a few features to org.dom4j.io.XMLWriter  
09:28 <vmassol> it's only one of the toXML() methods so we could depreczte it and move it to legacy at some point  
09:31 <tmortagne> deprecating it does not really change anything, you still need it  
09:31 <tmortagne> you can't remove the dom4j jar basically

11:59 <vmassol> (check the 7.2 roadmap)

23:51 <mmercer> lo all;  anyone know of any other providers/hosts other than xwiki.com and arvixe.com ?  would like to have xwiki for the office, but mgr doesnt want us to have to admin it, and google isnt returning much
